pageTitle: Hiring Staff to Align with Business Strategy
description: Working as a fiduciary under the DOL rule will potentially impact the future of your staffing needs as well as organizational design. To turn the constraint of the DOL rule into an opportunity, you must become very adept at managing all the intricacies of human capital within your business.

resourceStepList.title: Determine Staffing Needs
resourceStepList.description: The most critical aspect of your human capital strategy is to make sure it is aligned with your business strategy Knowing your value proposition, target market and core competencies will allow you to hire the right skillset for the right job in pursuit of your goals. Cetera Financial Group's Staffing Tools and Resources within Pentameter, our award winning practice management platform, help advisors create the necessary scale to navigate DOL and all your hiring needs. Please use the resource below to learn more about this robust capability.

resourceStepList.title: Learn More about how Cetera Financial Group can help you Navigate the DOL Fiduciary Rule
resourceStepList.description: We have the expertise to help you bring your business to the next level. You manage your relationship with your clients and assist them in reaching their financial goals, and we provide you with just about everything you need to do just that, short of a desk chair. Contact us now to learn about how we can put the full scale and resources of our network of firms to work for you.
